à®. à®®à®à®®à¯ (g.)
à®.à®¨à¯: mac (mak). A. Gaelic word signifying so, and prefixed to many surnames, as Mac Donald, Mac Grigor, & c. It is synonymous with Son in tentonic origin.... and with mab or Map (shortened into Ab or Ap) in Webh names. It is allied to Goth. magus, a son fen, magaths (G. magd, a maid.).
- The Imperial Dictionary of the English Language.

à®. à®®à®à®®à¯ (g.)
à®.à®¨à¯: mac (mak). A. Gaelic word signifying so, and prefixed to many surnames, as Mac Donald, Mac Grigor, & c. It is synonymous with Son in tentonic origin.... and with mab or Map (shortened into Ab or Ap) in Webh names. It is allied to Goth. magus, a son fen, magaths (G. magd, a maid.).
- The Imperial Dictionary of the English Language.
